title: ELKO Group wants to become the official distribution of Google hardware in the EMEA region.
content:
Greetings, Google.

My name is Māris, I work at ELKO Group. We're a technology distributor, that operates in 31 countries in the EMEA region and we're very interested in becoming a distributor for Google products.

Please, point me in the right direction, we really hope to become a distribution partner.

Kind regards
Māris Vilde
Business Development Manager
